Module WitchHunt

Package fr.sos.witchhunt.controller

package fr.sos.witchhunt.controller

'Controller' level of the application's MVC architecture. Contains classes the roles of which are :

- To make the link between the 'model' level and the 'view' level in terms of display, while making sure to keep these two levels independent of each other.

- To gather user-input through the 'view' and transfer it to the 'model'.

- To manage and synchronize concurrence between the different views in use.

- To initialize the core components and control the execution flow

See Also:
  • DisplayMediator
  • InputMediator
  • fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions
  • fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.core
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.sos.witchhunt
    The application's root package. Package organization is based on the application's MVC architecture.
    fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.core
    Contains the application's core classes, those that are in charge of initializing every core and common component, and of controlling the execution flow.
    fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions
    Classes in this package are in charge of passing information based on user-input gathered from the view to the model, while making sure to keep these two levels independent of each other
    fr.sos.witchhunt.model
    This package contains all interfaces and classes that are used at plural levels of the MVC-architecture's model.
    fr.sos.witchhunt.view
    Root of the 'view' level of the Application's MVC architecture. The code of each concurrent view should be organized in its own package.
  • Class
    Description
    ConcreteDisplayMediator
    Central class linking the application's 'model' and 'view' levels in terms of display.
    ConcreteInputMediator
    Central class connecting the application's 'model' and 'view' levels in terms of user-input.
    DisplayMediator
    Interface implemented by the central display controller
    InputMediator
    Interface implemented by the central input controller
